1251211111222111222221112111.content:
Whilst Ricky distracted their new dad, Karen made her way over to their new mom.

"Hey Mom!" Karen chirped to her embarrassment, she still had a woman's voice compared to Jane but she still thought it sounded childish.

"I'm happy you and Ricky are getting along so well now." Jane immediately began mothering her, "I was getting worried."

"Why Mom?" Karen asked, "Can't I just be a normal teenager who finds her little brother annoying from time to time."

"Time to time!" Jane laughed "You fight with Ricky everyday!"

The divorce flashed through Karen's head, "We have our reasons Mom. You shouldn't insert yourself into our relationship."

"I very well should Karen, I birthed you two after all." Jane countered.

"I don't mean it like that" she insisted before saying. "What if things were reversed?"

"Like if me and your dad were fighting everyday?" Jane asked.

"You wouldn't want me and Ricky getting into your business." Karen suggested.

"It depends Karen," Jane stated, "If you thought you could do something to help us stop fighting then I would be happy for you to intervene."

Karen was shocked by that and quite saddened. Had Jane wanted to intervene before all this?

"I just want everyone to be happy." Karen said.

"You should start with yourself Karen." Jane suggested.

"How?" Karen asked.

"With Ricky for one." Jane offered, "He's at a very precious age right now and will be entering puberty before too long. Soon he's going to be bigger and stronger than you are, he'll resent you if you keep acting this way towards him."

"But he's so selfish Mom! It's always about him not me!" Karen said.

"That's how boys are Karen," Jane admitted, "But if you show him some honest affection for once. Give him a nice sisterly hug, kiss him on the cheek, let him know you're going to look out and protect him as he's growing up. If you play your cards right Karen you'll win Ricky's loyalty for the rest of both your lives. He'll look back onto his childhood as your little brother with fondness rather than regret."

Karen teared up a bit, "Have I been so horrible to him?"

"No sweetie, you have your good days with Ricky." Jane calmed her. "It's just that you've been so vicious to him since becoming a teenager. You used to get along so well just a couple of years ago."

"Being a teenager sucks Mom." Karen whined, "You should know that."

"It's been so long Karen....." Jane trailed off before addressing her, "I was such a nasty girl Karen. I have so many regrets."

"Really?" Karen asked.

"I was so mean to my little brother and I was even worse to my mom." Jane elaborated. "She didn't deserve any of it, she was such a sweet and gentle woman. I was just tired of her fighting with my dad all the time. I even made this stupid wish during a summer vacation that they wouldn't even be my parents anymore. I was so messed up."

A wish, Karen had no evidence but something about that statement confirmed in her everything happening. It was Jane that had wished her and Ricky into their kids. Unintentionally most likely, but that was how the wish must have turned out. She still loved both her and Richard in her heart for the wish to rearrange the Harper family as such.

"I love you Mom." Karen said.

"I love you too sweetheart." Jane replied and kissed her.

Karen awkwardly returned the gesture. It was becoming clear to her that Disney World itself, through some magical means, was doing everything in its power to keep the Harper family together. The permanence of the divorce coupled with Jane's wish made it so that neither she nor her husband Richard were going to leave Epoct with their adulthoods intact. Frozen Ever After was going to turn her and into a bigger Frozen fan than Jane ever was. She knew that now, but if she could break the altered memories of her grown children. Just so they knew how much Ricky and her loved them as their parents, she was willing to switch places with Jane as the family's bratty teenage daughter. Just so they both knew she had once been their mother.

"Well, here we are Karen." Jane finally said, "Frozen Ever After."
1251211111222111222221112111.title: The Ice Queen Melts.

Karen quickly approached Ricky are they entered the ride's strangely short line, "Mom wished us into not being her parents."

Ricky looked rather shocked by that, "So...that's why we're turning into kids again?"

"Something along those lines yeah." Karen confirmed, 'She didn't intend for it to happen this way I think."

"What can we do?" Ricky asked, "This ride is going to finally turn both of us into Frozen fans after all these years."

"Did you learn anything from Dad?" she asked.

"He liked being my son." Ricky told her, "He wants me to be a better son than he was as a son to me."

"Same with Mom." Karen confirmed, "I just want to them to know how much we love them, you know."

"Can't we just wish that?' Ricky asked with all the innocence of a boy.

"That's it!" Karen exclaimed, "We could do that!"

Not long afterwards, the two shrunken adults load in between their full grown children on Frozen Ever After.

As the ride began, Karen and Ricky wished from the bottom of their heart that Jane and Robert were once more aware of being their kids. Meanwhile the ride worked its magic on the Harper family for a third time. Karen's mom-do of a haircut grew in length and far less mature in style, a few bright highlights appeared as her brown hair grew down her neck and behind her shoulders before resting at the top of her slender back. Ricky's receded hair regained it's former glory and turn much brighter in tone as it middle age cut turned into an average young boy's hair style.

At the same time, Jane and Robert matured in their hair styles. Jane's long teenage hair shortened to her shoulders while Robert's receded naturally back somewhat like Richard's had been.

I hope this works Karen said as she felt herself slip further back into girlhood.

The magic's power seemed to go into overdrive at that moment and she looked down on herself as her clothes shifted into a cyan colored t-shirt with was adorned with both Princess Elsa and Princess Anna. The rest of her attire shifted similarly to match the teenage Disney fangirl she was becoming. Ricky's outfit did the same and his work shift turned into a black Star Wars t-shirt adorned with the cast of the new trilogy of movies.

One look at Jane and Robert showed that they had assumed adult clothing that mirrored yet differed from Karen and Richard's original outfits.

Jane, for one, discovered that she liked being five years old again. She was young and adorable, and she had more energy than she knew what to do with. For the first time in years, she felt like running around the place or playing with other kids her age. She could feel herself start grinning ear-to-ear. She no longer had to put up with the stress that came from high school, and she had wished things could be as easy as they were when she was little. Maybe they would. Maybe her parents' relationship would return to how it was ten years ago. Jane didn't much care -- all she cared about was that now she was free to play all day without anyone's judging her. She was a little girl again, and she wanted to act like one.

Since Jane was the one who made the wish, only she was exempt from this, but across the world reality had changed. Karen and Richard had now been born in the late eighties and were now millennials. They had married in 2011, and Jane was born two years later in 2013. Robert had been born just six months ago, in late 2017. So as far as anyone knew, Jane had never been any older than five, nor had anyone else in her family been any older than they were now. And the best part that made Jane start to enjoy this is that in regressing ten years, her parents began to adopt their younger personalities, and as such were getting along a lot better. Due to this, Jane didn't mind being a little girl again.

         Karen smiled down at Jane. "So, baby girl, what do you want to do? This is your day -- well, yours and Bobby's," she added, and she tickled little Robert, who giggled.

         Jane smiled, deciding to embrace her new age. If she had become a five-year-old, she was going to act like one and enjoy this day like any small child would. What does she say?

1251211221222212.content:
To Jane's shock and disbelief, she was now small enough to be held by her ten-year-old brother, while her mommy stood nearby, holding a diaper bag. More upsetting than this, however, was the fact that Jane began to realize that she had already used her diaper. She had felt the urge to go to the bathroom before the transformation, and now that it had happened, her smaller body apparently couldn't hold it any longer. She was now wet and sitting in her own waste. Suffice it to say, she was not happy, and so she started to cry.

         Her parents immediately came to her side, and Robert tried to calm her down. But then the smell hit their noses, and they realized what the problem was.

         "Oh," said Robert. "I think she needs to be changed." Looking down at Jane, he said in baby talk, "Don't you, little sis?"

         In spite of herself, Jane felt herself start to giggle and kick her legs. Her teenage mentality made her feel ashamed for such an infantile reaction to being talked down to like that, but she couldn't help it. Her innate baby instincts must have kicked in.

         Karen reached forward and picked Jane up out of Robert's arm. "Richard, dear," she said, and Jane was stunned to hear how sweet she sounded toward him; the intent behind her wish seemed to have been met. "Watch Robert while I go change little miss stinky here."

         "Of course," said Richard.

         Then diaper bag in one arm and little Jane in the other, Karen carried her daughter to a nearby restroom. Once inside, she laid her down on the changing table. Lifting the girl's legs into the air, she unbuttoned the onesie and took off the dirty diaper, tossing it into the bin.

         "Whoa," she said. "You're a mess, aren't you, Janie?"

         Once again, Jane felt embarrassed as she started giggling at being talked to like an infant. Then her mommy took out a package of baby wipes and began to wipe her butt. After subsequently powdering her, Karen took out a clean pink diaper with designs from the movie Frozen and wrapped it around her daughter's waist. After taping it on, she buttoned the onesie and lifted Jane into her arms.

         "All right now, little girl," she said. "Let's go join Daddy and big bro. This is our first family vacation since you were born, and we want it to be special."

         Then she walked out of the bathroom. As Jane was carried out by her mommy, she couldn't help but ponder the fact that her parents and brother were all treating her like she had never been any older than ten months old. Did they even notice that anything had happened?

When Karen returned (with Jane) to Richard and Robert, they continued about their day, riding more rides and the like -- now headed more for rides for little kids given Jane's new age. As they did so, Jane began to reality that reality had completely changed. Her parents and brother had no recollection that she had ever been fifteen years old. She had gone from the firstborn to the baby in a matter of seconds, and now it was beginning to grow harder not to think of her former little brother as her big brother.

         She also began to piece together how this wish had smoothed out her parents relationship. She wasn't sure on the mechanics of it, but it seemed that much of the problems with their relationship had been that they each wanted to do more out of life, but then Jane had been born and they had to put many of their dreams on hold. However, waiting five more years to have their first child must have been enough time for them to live out their dreams, and with their now being happy with how their lives turned out, they were now happy with each other.

         Jane was happy to see her parents' relationship was solid again, but it was bittersweet. It would have been better if her parents could have worked this out without her having to return to diapers. Being a baby again was not fun. In fact, it was a little boring. But now she was trapped. The big sister had become the little sister, and she could she no way out. How does she deal with that?

She was a baby again. Jane had gone from the fifteen-year-old firstborn child of Richard and Karen to the ten-month-old baby. She wished it could be otherwise, but there was no use. She might as well just accept it. She had little other choice. Besides, she got what many dreamed -- another childhood and a break from the stress and responsibility that is sometimes expected in high school. She could just be carefree and play all day, while others took care of her. She could do anything, and they would just excuse it as her being "just a baby" and "not knowing any better."

         The minute these thoughts crosses her mind, this whole became a hell of a lot more fun. She even began to enjoy Robert's babying her the entire trip. She could get used to be the youngest child.

12512112212222122122.title: She is either fed from a bottle or fed baby food.

125121122122221222.content:
Jane couldn't just accept this. She was fifteen, not a baby. She should be in high school, not in diapers. She should be worrying about acne or other teenage problems, not who was going to feed and change her. This was completely unacceptable. Sitting in her mommy's arms, Jane could do nothing but kick her legs and cry as she threw a tantrum. Karen tried to soothe her, but nothing could calm her down.

         After a while, her mommy finally said, "All right. I don't know what's wrong. I've tried feeding her; I've tried changing her. I think someone's just a little cranky."

         "Well, she's not even one yet," Richard pointed out. "Maybe we should have waited until she was older to come here."

         "Maybe," Karen admitted. "All right. Why don't you go on ahead with Bobby? I'm going to take Janie back to the hotel. Maybe she needs nap."

         Then Karen took the diaper bag from her husband and carried Jane out of the park. The former teenage girl cried the entire time. Nothing could calm her down, because she was sick of being a baby -- she wanted to be a teen again.

         What now?
125121122122221222.title: Cranky

choices: She sits down on the bed, turns on the TV, and gently rocks Jane to sleep.
She takes out some baby toys and tries to cheer Jane up.

1251211221222212221.title: Baby Time

choices: Yes, Jane's infantile instincts kick in, and she falls right to sleep.
No, since Jane still has her adolescent mentality, she remains restless.
12512112212222122211.content:
Upon entering the hotel, Karen sat down on the bed and flipped on the TV, deciding to see what was on the news, her daughter's head rested on her arm. Slowly, she rocked Jane back and forth.

         "There, there, baby," she said softly. "You're just tired, aren't you? Come on. Go to sleep."

         As she watched the television and rocked her daughter, Karen began to sing a lullaby. Does all this work? Is Karen able to rock Jane to sleep?
12512112212222122211.title: Rocking the Baby

choices: Not long -- an hour at most.
Hours -- Richard and Robert have returned by now.
125121122122221222111.content: In spite of herself, Jane felt herself falling right to sleep. She might mentally be a teenager, but physically she was still just a baby girl, and she couldn't ignore her baby instincts. In seconds, she had fallen right asleep. How long does she sleep?
125121122122221222111.title: Sleepy

1251211221222212221112.content:
Jane realized she must have really been tired. When she awoke, it was the next morning, and her brother and father had long since returned from the park. She opened her eyes and saw she cuddled with her mommy. Feeling hungry, she started to cry. In response, Richard, who was already awake, lifted her up into his arms without waking Karen or Robert.

         "Okay, Janie," he said. "Let's get you fed."

         Rocking Jane gently in his arms, Richard prepared her a bottle and started to feed her. Jane drank greedily. She knew this was baby formula, but for some reason she didn't mind. Her taste buds seemed to have adjusted to her age. All she seemed to care about was that she was hungry and this was food. Before long, the bottle was empty, and she felt full.

         "There you go," said Richard.

         What happens now?
1251211221222212221112.title: Feeding Time

choices: This was their last day; it is now time to return home.
Deciding to give Jane another chance, they head back to the park.
12512112212222122211121.content:
After her daddy had finished feeding her, Jane suddenly became aware that she had pooped her diaper, which had already been a little wet when she woke up. Now in need of a change, she started crying.

         "Uh-oh," Richard cooed. "Did somebody make a stinky?"

         Richard laid Jane down on a nearby table, where her diaper bag was already placed. Then he lifted the little girl's legs into the air and unbuttoned her onesie. Removing her diaper, he tossed it into the bin and began wiping her clean. Once he had powdered her, he then took out a new diaper -- a white one decorated with sky blue flowers. Then he wrapped it around her waist and taped it on.

         Following this Richard switched his daughter out her onesie, and dressed her in a plain purple onesie. Then lifting her into his arms, he turned around, and Jane saw that her mommy and brother were awake.

         "I couldn't sleep," Richard said, "so I figured I'd get the baby fed and changed. You looked like you could do with a lie-in."

         "Thanks, dear," said Karen, and she took Jane into her arms. The girl found herself giggling as Robert tickled her feet.

         "Oh," Robert said. "My baby sister is just the cutest."

         "She sure is, dear," said Karen.

         For the next hour or so, Jane found herself crawling on the ground, while Robert knelt onto the ground and played with her. This was such a weird experience, and she still wasn't sure she liked it, but she didn't know what was to be done with it. She had to make that wish, and now she was stuck as a baby. It just wasn't fair.

         What now?
12512112212222122211121.title: Jane needs her diaper changed.

choices: They return home, where Jane's onetime same age cousin had been house-sitting.
At some point on the ride home, Jane starts to enjoy being a baby again.
125121122122221222111211.content:
After a while, it was time to check out, so Karen lifted Jane into her arms, while Robert helped her gather all of her toys and baby supplies. Then they headed outside, while Richard dealt with the hotel staff. Heading out into the parking lot and to their car, Karen opened the back seat door, and Jane saw that there was now a car seat there. She felt really bizarre as Robert helped their mother fasten her into the car seat. Then he got in beside her, and her parents got in the front. Before long, they were on the road.

         As they drove home, Jane kicked her legs, which hung over the side of the car seat and giggled as her now big brother tickled and cooed her. He clearly liked having her as his baby sister. Jane was sure she'd ever seen Robert this happy to see her. She was ashamed to admit that he was much better big brother to her than she'd been a big sister.

         What now?
125121122122221222111211.title: Going Home

choices: Jane has a tantrum and makes changing her difficult.
1251211221222212221112111.content:
It was a long drive back home to Georgia, but eventually they did arrive. As they pulled into the driveway, Jane started to get fussy. When they were at the park, being a baby again had been bad, but now she was returning home as one? It was all starting to feel more real. Karen looked back and smiled down at her.

         "It's all right, Janie," she said. "We're home. You probably just need a nap."

         She got out of the car and unfastened Jane from her car seat and lifted her into her arms. As Karen held little Jane close, she suddenly scrunched up her nose and said, "Oh! And a diaper change. Looks like someone had an accident."

         "Tell me about it," said Robert. "I had sit with her the whole way here. You're a stinky little thing," he added teasingly at his baby sister. "Aren't you?"

         And then Robert started cooing her yet again. This was so annoying. She wasn't a baby -- she was fifteen years old. When she said she wished for things to be like when she was younger, she hadn't even been that serious and this was definitely not what she had in mind.

         "Yeah," said Karen. "And the sooner we get her inside, the sooner we can get her changed."

         Then with Robert helping Richard unload their things, Karen took Jane and the diaper bag and entered the house. Once inside, they were greeted by Megan, Jane and Robert's seventeen-year-old cousin who had been housesitting. Megan had been Jane's best friend back when they were both teenage girls, but now . . . The instant, Megan saw Jane, she looked at her with adoring look that Jane had been getting used to getting.

         "Ah, Aunt Karen," she said. "You're back. Hi there, Janie," she added, her voice raising in pitch. "Did you have fun, baby girl?"

         "She was a little cranky," said Karen. "I'm thinking she was too little to enjoy that trip. We'll go back when she's older. Now if you don't mind, Janie had a little accident on the way over here, and I really do need to get her changed."

         Without further ado, Karen carried little Jane past the door which she knew led to her bedroom and into another room -- the one that should have belonged to Robert. Jane mentally cursed; now that she was the baby instead of Robert, she was stuck with the smaller room. And when they stepped inside, it was immediately clear that it had become a nursery. The walls were now painted pink, there were toys all over the floor, and to either wall was a crib and a changing table.

         Partly from the discomfort of needing her diaper changed and partly from just being fed up with all this, Jane opened her mouth and started bawling.

         "It's all right, sweetie," said Karen. "Mommy's here."

         She walked over to the changing table and laid Jane down. As Karen prepares to change Jane's diaper, what happens?

         Jane shook her head and starting crying even harder. She was fine when it was her mommy who was changing her; she did that when Jane was a baby the first time. But there was no way she wanted her cousin who was just two years older than her to change her diaper. That was too embarrassing, even if Megan didn't know her true age. She tried to shoot her mom a look, pleading with her to turn down Megan's offer.

As she ran, Jane began to feel the park grow slightly bigger around her. From her peripheral vision, she could see that her body had grown a little chubbier as baby fat began to return to her. She could feel with her tongue that the empty space between her teeth had been filled, signifying that that baby tooth was back, but another tooth -- that had been an adult one -- was an empty space again. More importantly, she could tell from the crinkling sound as she ran. Yes, she was definitely seven years old -- she'd had a problem with accidents, which was why she often wore a pair of plastic underwear.

         Over that underwear, she now wore a bright yellow Cinderella T-shirt and a matching yellow skirt, but her feet were completely bare. However, as she looked behind her, she noticed the white flip-flops she must have kicked off before she started running. As for her curly blond hair, it was now tied back in a cute baby blue ponytail. She looked just as she did when she was seven years old the first time.

         Nevertheless, Jane didn't care. She didn't care that she under five feet and wearing plastic underwear. She felt so young and carefree, and she was not an infant.          This is not what I wanted at all, she thought. When I made this wish, I did not intend for myself to be in diapers. And I certainly didn't intend for Robert to become a girl. Or for Mommy and Daddy to become brother and sister. I wish things would become a little normal.

         Miraculously, the wish was granted, but still not in the way Jane intended. It was clear Karen and Richard were not happy in their marriage and to fix that, whatever magic was causing this had decided they would do better as siblings. So per the intent of Jane's first wish, that would not be reversed. But Jane began to feel herself grow older. What is happening?

She did not like being two years old again.

Her curly blond hair was tied up in pigtails, and she was just as pudgy and adorable as she had been when she was a baby. Her clothes had now changed into a cute childish light blue dress, which didn't even cover the plain white disposable diaper she had on underneath. 12512112212222122211122221112122.content:
The age gap began to close. Before long, it had normalized, only in reverse. By the time she stopped aging, Jane was only six years younger than Robin, which was closer in age to her former brother than she'd been in a while. The problem was that now she was the younger sibling, which was something she was still not sure she liked. The other problem was that she was only four years old, not fully potty-trained, and she hadn't even started school yet. She could walk on her own two feet, but was expected to hold her mommy's hand and to tell her when she had to go potty.

         Furthermore, when Jane managed to catch a glimpse of her own reflection, she felt embarrassed. She still looked humiliatingly like a little girl. Her curly blond hair was tied up in pigtails. She still had a baby face, and her pudgy body still had a slight infantile look about it. She had yet to lose any of her baby teeth -- she could feel with her tongue that none of them were even loose. She also now wore a childish purple dress that barely covered the purple Tangled pull-up she wore on underneath. Her shoes had been replaced with a pair of light-up Disney Princess sandals. She might not be a baby anymore, but she was a far cry from the teenage girl she had been.

Suddenly, Jane felt her crotch grow warm, and she realizing that she had just peed herself. Looking up at Karen, she said, "Mama, I had an accident."

         She blushed at the toddlerish sound to her words. There was a distinct lisp to her voice. She didn't sound anything like the teenage girl she still felt like.

         Karen sighed with exasperation. "Oh, Jane. You're supposed to tell Mommy when you've got to go potty."

         "I'm sorry," said Jane in a small voice.

         "It's okay, sweetie," said Karen. "That's why you've got that pull-up on. You're still learning. Come on."

         What now?

Her skin had softened, but not by much since she had previously been a prepubescent boy. Her clothing had changed to a blue-violet T-shirt, a pink skirt, and a pair of light blue flip flops. Jane could hardly believe that she had once been a teenage girl, while Robin used to be a prepubescent child -- now the two of them looked every bit of the part of a little girl in diapers and a young teen girl who was just starting to move into puberty.

Jane nearly had another accident when she saw her father and brother, who had now become her aunt and brother. Richard -- now her Aunt Rebecca -- had gotten at least ten years younger and was now much more feminine. She wore her brown hair in a ponytail, and she was now dressed in a light pink Grey's Anatomy T-shirt, light blue shorts, and a pair of beige sandals. Her looks had adjusted slightly, so that she really did look like Karen's younger sister.

         Robin (the former Robert), on the other hand, had gone in the opposite direction. She had actually grown older and was starting to look how Jane used to -- people always did say that the two siblings looked alike. Her sandy hair was cut short and had blond highlights, and she was dressed in clothes that Jane recognized from her former wardrobe -- a midnight blue tank top and a lighter blue skirt. She wore no shoes that Jane could see and was walking around the park barefoot. Jane vaguely wondered if the female teenage version of her brother shared Tahiri Veila's idea about footwear.

Her brown hair, with red highlights, was tied back in a ponytail, and she was dressed in a style similar to how Jane used to dress before she became a baby -- a midnight blue tank top, a light purple skirt, and a pair of black sandals.

         Robert -- who Jane now knew to be called Robin -- was just a three-year-old toddler, still Jane's older sibling but closer in age to her. Her sandy hair had lightened to blond and was now tied up in pigtails. Her baby teeth had all returned, and like Rebecca, her clothes had changed with her. She now wore a light green Little Mermaid T-shirt and a light blue skirt, underneath which Jane could see a pair of purple Princess and the Frog pull-ups. She had no shoes that Jane could see and would be walking around barefoot if Rebecca wasn't holding her.

         So, Karen was now the older sister of a twenty-year-old girl, and the single mother of two little girls under the age of five. Is she still forty?

12512112212222122221.content:
Robert grinned as his dad led him to Splash Mountain. It was one of their most favorite rides at the park. Richard always loved the animatronic figures, and Robert loved just how thrilling it was. They always rode it together. Karen wasn’t really a fan of it, neither understood why. There was just a sense of magic to it. Robert had worried they might not be able to go on it this year with a new baby, but was quite pleased with this development. Richard was also expecting it, and breathed a sigh of relief when Karen left with Jane. His wife was just a little too suffocating sometimes. Plus, he had been promising Robert he’d take him regardless, so he was happy he could keep the promise to his son.

While they were waiting in the queue, Robert looked up at his dad, “I can’t believe we’re getting to go this time.” Richard just smiled “Well, I said we’d go, didn’t I? It’s a tradition after all. My father and I rode it every year, and now the two of us can ride it together.”

“Yeah, I know, but you and mom have been so busy with the baby… I just thought, y’know…” Richard laughed and ruffled his son’s hair, to his embarrassment. “It’s a tradition that we ride it every year. We’re not going to let a new baby get in the way, you know that, right?” Robert grinned and nodded as Richard continued, “We’ve been riding this since you were in diapers too, y’know?” Robert laughed, “Dad, you know I don’t remember that!”

“Yep! You were always so cute too! Just giggling at the song and how you’d laugh and pee yourself when we went down the drop... Sometimes I wish we could go back to that time.” He teased as Robert blushed and looked down “Dad, c’mon, that’s embarrassing... But y’know, with you paying so much attention to Jane, I wouldn’t mind it either…” he half-whispered. Richard grinned wider at his son, “If it makes you feel any better, I was the same way as a toddler, at least according to my dad. I don’t remember it either, but… It’d be nice to be young again... Always appreciate your youth while you can, Bobby. There’s something you can’t get back when you’re older.” Robert chuckled “For some reason I have trouble imagining you in diapers… or peeing yourself on the waterfall. But… yeah, I know. I’ve been kinda jealous about Jane. She doesn’t have to worry about anything, and you’re always paying attention to her. I wouldn’t mind being little again.” Richard sighed and gave a sympathetic smile, “I know how you feel sport, I’d like to be little again too, but we at least have this to make us feel younger. And if it makes you feel any better, you’re still my favorite.” Robert perked up a little, “Thanks Dad.” He grinned.

12512112212222122222112111222.content:
Just as Karen and Richard age down to fourteen, Jane and Robert each age up to fourteen. On the ride, Richard and Robert are now both fourteen-year-old boys. Robert wore a royal blue Ravenclaw T-shirt, olive green shorts, and a pair of white socks; for some reason, he wore no shoes. Richard, on the other hand, wore a green Robin Hood T-shirt, tan jean shorts, and medium violet-red tennis shoes. Both boys had blond hair which was nearly shoulder-length and silver braces on their teeth. One could now see how much Robert took after his father; they looked like twins.

         Meanwhile, at the hotel, Jane has aged completely out of diapers and now joins her mother as a fourteen-year-old girl. Both girls had their hair tied up in pigtails; Jane wore a pink Tangled T-shirt, a light blue skirt, and a pair of pink flip-flops. Karen, however, was barefoot and dressed in a turquoise dress, and also unlike Jane had braces on her teeth. Unlike the boys, the girls didn't look like twins, but this was mainly since Jane's hair was red, and Karen's was brown.

         So, all four of them are fourteen. Anything else?

1311.content:
"Welcome to Hollywood, boys!" exclaimed Martin Kitt, a 17 year old boy who sounded like he was leading an expedition.

Martin's friends Johnny Ally, 17, Oliver Ally, 13, and Connor Winchel, 16, looked upon the surrounding area in awe.

Of course, they weren't really in Hollywood. Rather, they were in the Hollywood Studios park at Disney World. But it didn't matter to them. As four boys who had never been out of the state, it was as close to Fame as they were going to get.

"Do you think this is what the real Hollywood looks like?" Asked Oliver as he looked down this fictional Hollywood street.

"Yeah. I've seen pictures." said his brother Johnny.

"Man, can you imagine the fame and fortune you can get in the real Hollywood?" Connor said.

Martin and his friends weren't from the richest families in the world. In fact, it took them a long time to be able to go to Disney World for the first time, even though they lived in the state. And so they could only imagine what it would be like to have all the money and fame to go where you want to go and do what you want to do.

"Man, don't you wish we could all be famous?" Martin asked.

"Yeah." said the other three boys simultaneously.

"Welp, we have a lot to see. Don't know the next time we'll be back. So let's get started!" Martin said.

131311.content:
"Well… welcome to Hollywood, I guess!" said 45 year old Jack Riley, holding a map.

"Yup. Since none of us can afford living in the real Hollywood…" 47 year old Dave DiCaprio said.

"Oh, come on, Dave. Lighten up. So you recently joined us in the Divorced Men's club. Thing aren't all bad!" said Mark Sandari, age 43, cheerfully said as he patted Dave on the back.

"Yeah. We're at the happiest place on Earth, apparently. So, you know. be happy." Jack said, as the three of them walked down the street, towards the giant Mickey hat.

"We all got a good amount of money, so let's enjoy this vacation and our time away from out stupid wives." said Mark.

"Guys… I just wish that I could understand women. I mean, I'm going to go back into the dating pool again!" Dave said.

"Don't we all wish we could understand women? I just wish for us to have an awesome time on this vacation." said Jack

"And while we are all making unnecessary wishes, I'll wish that we meet some new people here so that we may all have a truly good time, if you know what I mean." said Mark.

"Oh stop it, Mark. Where do you guys want to head first?"
131311.title: Middle-aged

13131111212212321.content:
Jack quickly made his way back to the ride where his pals were waiting in line. He ducked under the barrier to join them.

"Hey, no cutting," Dave said to Jack.

"Come on, guys, it's me," Jack replied.

Dave and Mark looked confused.

"Me who?" Mark asked.

"Stop messing with me guys. I want to be on this ride as much as you do. You were supposed to save my place while I went to the bathroom."

Suddenly it dawned on them. "Jack?" They asked in unison.

Jack seemed very confused. It didn't feel like they were messing with him. They seemed genuinely shocked.

"Dude!" Dave exclaimed, "How the..your like this hot college chick now! How?"

Jack began to dig in the purse to find a small mirror. He looked at his own reflection. Sure enough, he had swapped bodies with the woman he bumped into at the bathroom!
13131111212212321.title: Jack heads off to find his friends

131311112211.content:
"Hello?" said an adult female voice on the other line.

"Hey, mom." Jack said, not catching himself.

"Hey Jack. You get to the park OK today?" Jack's ex-wife, Linda, asked. Jack might have found it odd that Linda wasn't angry that he called her if he had noticed that he had called her mom.

"Yeah. We just took the boat over from our hotel. It was very easy." Jack replied.

"You enjoying your stay at the Boardwalk?" Linda asked.

"Yes. It's a fun hotel. Lot's of nightlife." Jack smiled.

"No, Jack, don't get too crazy. I don't want to keep you from your friends any longer. Thanks for checking in. Call me a little later, OK?" Linda said.

"OK." Jack said.

"Love you sweety." Linda said.

"Love you too, mom." Jack said. He hadn't said, "I Love You" to Linda in a long time. But the times were a changing.

Finally, the edges of the shorts frayed a bit to be more stylish. Normally, none of these new clothes would fit a grown man. Dave had however shrunk in stature and frame until he was the size of a freshman girl!

Mark's clothes were also changing! Mark's short-sleeved shirt and shorts grew together into one long dress. Next, the clothes ditched their old color scheme for a nice pink sundress. Mark thought it looked nice. It was important to appreciate fashion. That's why Mark and Dave had spent hours picking out just the right clothes for their trip.

132311.content:
When they were children, Andy and Jane each used to come to this park all the time. Now as they walk around the park as adults they can't help but reminisce about those times. As they saw a group of kids who couldn't be more than twelve running around and having fun, the couple begin to long for the days when they could just spend all day having fun, with no job or other responsibilities to get back to. Filled with nostalgia, they both unknowingly make the same wish, a wish that when granted turns them into a couple of twelve-year-olds.
         What is their wish?

choices: They were wearing smaller versions of their adult clothing.
1323111.content:
When they were children, Andy and Jane each used to come to this park all the time. Now as they walk around the park as adults they can't help but reminisce about those times. As they saw a group of kids who couldn't be more than twelve running around and having fun, the couple begin to long for the days when they could just spend all day having fun, with no job or other responsibilities to get back to. Filled with nostalgia, they both unknowingly make the same wish.

         I wish we could be kids again, they both thought wistfully.

         Unbeknownst to them, this was called the Magic Kingdom for a reason. Instantly, a soft mist surrounded them, and when it had dissipated the crowd of preteens nearby suddenly looked much bigger, as they had shrunk drastically in height. As the newly-married couple exchanged glances, they realized they had both regressed to twelve years old.

         Andy now bore a buzzcut that had been typical of him at this age, while Jane's blond hair was now done up in pigtails. And when they opened their mouths, they each realized the other one had braces in their mouths. But how were they dressed?
1323111.title: To be kids again

choices: Nothing - they are still alone and just married; reality has now changed.
There have been some reality changes.
13231112.content:
The transformation did not stop with their physical ages, hair, and teeth. Their clothes had also completely transformed: Jack was wearing a red Star Wars T-shirt with blue shorts and sandals; Jane was dressed in a pink Aurora T-shirt with a matching skirt and flip flops. From the way they were dressed, it was difficult to imagine that these twelve-year-old kids used to be grown adults.

Nicole, Matilda, Rachel, and Ingrid walked over the bridge towards the fictional African town of Harambe.

"Man, I can't wait to see all the animals." Nicole said.

"Yeah. Like, I want to do, like, Kilimanjaro Safari first." Matilda said.

"Yes, Matilda, that's what we'd said we do." Rachel said, sighing. Matilda was not the brightest of the group.

"You know, I wish we could get up close to the animals. That'd be awesome." said Ingrid.

"I wish we, like, this spring break would never end." Matilda said.

"Yeah. No more school would be pretty nice." Nicole replied.

"Well, I just wish that we'll be together forever. Now let's see some Animals!"

1413111.content:
Nicole led the way onto the vehicle. The cage on the back of the truck rolled slowly along the plain. After a few short minutes, Rachel hopped up and down at the sight of a bunch of animals. There were cheetahs, lions, gazelles, and okapis nearby. Rachel had been mesmerized by the cheetah chasing a gazelle, and Matilda watched the gazelle's lithe movements. The okapi, shy like Ingrid was, came near to her, as she stood in awe. Nicole was creeped by her friends' viewing of the animals, but a lion on a cliff caught her eye and she was captured by its beauty. The lion leapt off the cliff and the other animals seemed to follow. The lion jumped at the safari vehicle as it followed, snapping the four girls out of their confusion. At the end of the ride, they felt a bit sick, so they leaned in an alley near a building and relaxed. Suddenly, Ingrid felt a tug on her hair. Her short hair lengthened to cover her entire body like a cocoon. Her arm was swallowed by her blonde hair, which was beginning to turn brown. White and black lines crisscrossed over her hair in strands. Next, Matilda felt her arm fall asleep. She shook it, and her braids came undone, bobbed, and lengthened. Each time she shook, it surrounded her even more. Nicole tried to stop her, but she couldn't hear. Her ears had folded in and hardened like solid rock. She was enveloped all of a sudden, and her hair-cocoon turned a dim cream. Rachel was next. Her long hair grabbed her arms, and a needle and thread appeared. She was forced to spool the thread with her needle, and her arms were moved quickly back and forth. As the thread was put on a spool, her hair turned golden and extended. When her hair let go, she was wrapped up. Nicole jumped and leaned back, as Rachel's hair had a stray sandy strand that gripped her and cocooned her in a fraction of a second. Her screams of "SHIT! AAH!" were picked up by a walkie-talkie nearby. An officer heard her and came all the way from EPCOT only to find a cheetah, an okapi, a gazelle, and a regal lioness all curled up and passed out in a cornet behind a building.

END

         In any other situation, Emily might have been more surprised, but after having been turned back into a baby, nothing could really surprise her now. Besides, she was really excited about being older. She kicked her legs and nodded excitedly, enthusiastic about this plan.

         However, not knowing what her proper age was, the Whites needed Emily to tell them, and right now the little girl was too young to talk. To compensate, the couple aged her up just old enough so she could talk. choices: Trying American cuisine in Splitsville and a round of bowling

15332122.content:
Stepping on the concrete lifted Mei Sung's spirits. She needed to get away from the busy business life of Japan and relax. Her co-workers told her that nobody relaxes better than the Americans. Being accustomed to such a high-profile lifestyle, as one co-worker spoke, they practically build places to relax even further.

Mei couldn't believe that. That was until she stepped into Downtown Disney. There was no shouting, no fighting, clean air, and a generally happy atmosphere with colorful characters decorating the merchandise every shop sold. The Asian woman lifted her sunglasses to get a full view. The place was just as beautiful as she is. Mei stood at an average height of an American woman, not Asain, including the average Asain female build. Tall, yet skinny.

One thing she was worried about, as a different co-worker told her, was that American's expect people to have big appetites. The portions they served at an average restaurant for lunch could feed an Asain family for at least two days.

Mei would soon find out that these Americans don't joke around with their food. Whatever.

The sun was shining brighter than ever. So she popped her sunglasses back on. Dressed in a loose white T-shirt, black shorts, basic sneakers, and a cute ladybug bookbag. Mei decided to have enough time reflecting on American culture and decided to start relaxing. Mei starts her day off by...
15332122.title: The Downtown Disney Adventure of Mei Sung

choices: Mei ended with a low score (in the 70's)
Mei finished with a high score (in the 200's)
153321221.content:
Mei didn't expect the server to be so nice. Or so cute. The server is a full figured All-American blonde. When Mei approached, the server unintentionally towered over her. Since Mei had never experienced bowling or American cuisine. She recommended Mei start off with the Bowl n' Burger combo which came with one game of bowling and a burger conjoined with a basket of fries. As Mei was seated, she watched the server walk with grace and a swish of her voluptuous hips.

"Goodness," Mei felt a little jealousy creep up on her. When her co-workers spoke of the portions Americans ate, all they described were how they were like blobs. Such as the ones from Wall-E. Mei never imagined the food travelling to all the right places. She placed her hands on her hips. In comparison, narrow and flat were the words that came to mind when she looked at the waiter. Round and wide. Just like the women from Disney films. Except the waiter was a little fuller figured.

To start a new game. Roll the ball.

The electronic voice from the TV screen caught her attention. Mei shook her head back to attention. It was rude to stare at somebody, in every national custom. Mei picked up a light ball, around five to six pounds in weight and rolled it down the lane. The ball certainly didn’t travel well because it ended up in the gutter without striking a single pin. Mei felt even more certain that she didn’t throw it right from the throbbing in her fingers. “I’ll figure it out.”

"Here's your burger basket!" The server smiled with her peppy voice, "If you need anything else. Just give me a holler." Mei didn't force a smile like she usually did with other waiter's. She even caught herself staring at the server’s backside again. "Oh goodness. These American's...and this food." Mei gasped at the incredible size of the portions Splitsville served. The burger and fries had to be at least twice the size McDonald's in Japan served.

Like any human would do with any food. They take the first bite to indicate the first impression. Mei had taken her within seconds. Meat, cheese, lettuce, mayo, and ketchup. Oh, man. Her taste buds really seemed to enjoy this. Once again her co-workers were right, if American's were good at one thing, they knew how to make tasty food.

Throughout the game, Mei snuck a few bites of her burger and fries before rolling the ball down the lane. The taste was excellent before, but now it started to grow on her even further. She hoped it wouldn’t blow up into a full blown craving.

Before she knew it. The game landed on the tenth frame. Mei prepared her roll and sent it speeding down the lane. Her eyes widened in anticipation only to shut close in disappointment. Only one pin ended up knocked over by the balls weight. This is basically what people would call a gutterball. However, Mei couldn't be mad. She had lots of fun and during she tasted her first American cuisine that tasted absolutely divine.

Mei plucked the last few fries from the basket and peeped at the scoreboard to see her score.
153321221.title: Splitsville

info.brief_description: The happiest place on Earth literally becomes a place of magic!
info.description:
Who doesn't love Disney World? It is a truly magical place, where seemingly anything can happen. and now, you're going to make it literally magic. What if some of that Disney magic seeped out into the real world, transforming one of those millions of guests in some for or another?


Some ground rules:

- No murder or killing of our main characters

- Keep it clean. You can have the occassional swear, and of course the romantic encounter, but let's keep it light on the hardcore profanity and sex, alright?

- I'm going to allow weight gain in the story, but only if it is to a realistic extent. I don't want any characters becoming 900 pounds. The 300 pound range is perfectly fine.

- Have fun! Disney is a big place. So go wild!
